description: This file implements process functions for the Slap Loam Broker Object in the Service Logic Aggregation Plane (SLAP). It includes the implementation of the core method SlapLboAsyncCallTaskLoco for asynchronous object location calls and several placeholder functions to process different IMCP-based SLAP calls, most of which return 'invalid request type' or 'unsupported' status.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapLboAsyncCallTaskLoco(ANSC_HANDLE hCallInfo)
methods.description: Performs an asynchronous object location call in a separate task, handling message buffer allocation, IMCP call setup, and processing the reply to determine if the object has been located successfully.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapLboProcessCallAcqc(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hLpcPartyAddr,void * pInputBuffer,ULONG ulInputSize,void ** ppOutputBuffer,PULONG pulOutputSize,PULONG pulErrorCode)
methods.description: Stub function that rejects 'Call Acquire' IMCP request types with an 'invalid request' error code.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapLboProcessCallRelc(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hLpcPartyAddr,void * pInputBuffer,ULONG ulInputSize,void ** ppOutputBuffer,PULONG pulOutputSize,PULONG pulErrorCode)
methods.description: Stub function that rejects 'Call Release' IMCP request types similarly.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapLboProcessCallLoco(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hLpcPartyAddr,void * pInputBuffer,ULONG ulInputSize,void ** ppOutputBuffer,PULONG pulOutputSize,PULONG pulErrorCode)
methods.description: Processes 'Loco' (location) calls, performing object binding lookups, broadcasting requests to other LPC parties if needed, and constructing responses accordingly.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapLboProcessCallDelo(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hLpcPartyAddr,void * pInputBuffer,ULONG ulInputSize,void ** ppOutputBuffer,PULONG pulOutputSize,PULONG pulErrorCode)
methods.description: Stub function that rejects 'Call Delocator' request types.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapLboProcessCallInvo(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hLpcPartyAddr,void * pInputBuffer,ULONG ulInputSize,void ** ppOutputBuffer,PULONG pulOutputSize,PULONG pulErrorCode)
methods.description: Stub function for 'Invo' calls, returning an unsupported status.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapLboProcessCallAcqo(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hLpcPartyAddr,void * pInputBuffer,ULONG ulInputSize,void ** ppOutputBuffer,PULONG pulOutputSize,PULONG pulErrorCode)
methods.description: Stub function for 'Acqo' (acquire object) calls, returning unsupported status.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapLboProcessCallRelo(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hLpcPartyAddr,void * pInputBuffer,ULONG ulInputSize,void ** ppOutputBuffer,PULONG pulOutputSize,PULONG pulErrorCode)
methods.description: Stub function for 'Relo' (release object) calls, returning unsupported status.
